overview:
Jeremy graduated from the University of Idaho in May 2009 with Bachelors of Science in Information Systems and Business Productions and Operations Management. His course of education took him through the Integrated Business Curriculum (IBC) program, which integrates accounting, finance, human resources and marketing with a management focus. During IBC he and his team were awarded the Randy C. Byers Team of the Year¬ù award and scholarship for outstanding work throughout the two semesters. He also participated in several entrepreneurial endeavors while at Idaho, including Vandal Solutions, a student-run marketing organization where he managed the development of websites and design material. Jeremy was also selected to be a part of a team that traveled to Macedonia to develop a student-run consulting business with students from a local university in Skopje.

Jeremy’s passion is in wed-based technologies. He built his first web site and application while in junior high. Specifically, he has developed several e-commerce and content management websites, covering the entire development life cycle. After finishing his college degree Jeremy was hired on as a Project Manager for a software design studio called Gravity Jack, a company who specializes in the Augmented Reality tech space.

Today, Jeremy is co-founder & CEO of RewardsForce Inc, a company that provides SAS player tracking to casinos. Their technology is innovative in that it uses web based technologies to scale easily, Apple iPad hardware to collect player data through simple apps and complex reporting and segmenting practices that are conversational in nature. RewardsForce was given an opportunity to participate in the inaugural class of TechStars Seattle after it won the University of Idaho View Business Plan competition in 2010.
